prod_short_desc: Team up to take on Ayesha and save the galaxy!
prod_long_desc:
Stage a cosmic battle with this action-packed Guardians of the Galaxy set featuring Ayesha’s Golden Drone spaceship with two stud shooters, and Yondu’s Laser Drill spaceship with a spring-loaded missile, sliding minifigure cockpit and opening side panels. Includes three minifigures and a Groot figure in Ravager costume.
Build the battle on Ego’s planet between Ayesha’s golden drone and the Guardians of the Galaxy’s laser drill spaceship, with spring-launching missile, stud-shooters, and exploding cliff section!
Featured in Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
Includes minifigures of Yondu, Star-Lord and Ayesha, plus Baby Groot figure with Ravager jacket decoration
LEGO Marvel Super Heroes building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
Laser drill is 3” high, 6” long, and 2” wide. Golden drone is 1” high, 2” long, and 3” wide. Planet cliff section is 2” wide, 2” long, and under 1” high
323 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 7 and 14 years old
